HTMLElementTogglePopover.summary: The togglePopover() method of the interface toggles a {{domxref("Popover_API", "popover", "", "nocode")}} element (i.e. one that has a valid popover attribute) between the hidden and showing states.

remarks.para: When togglePopover() is called on an element with the popover attribute:

HTMLElementTogglePopover.returns: true if the popup is open after the call, and false otherwise.None () may be returned in older browser versions (see browser compatibility).
